subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The Jayhawks trailed for most of the game, but a late rally and tough defense in the game’s final minutes earned them their second appearance in the championship game in five years.
snippet: The Jayhawks trailed for most of the game, but a late rally and tough defense in the game’s final minutes earned them their second appearance in the championship game in five years.
